entry.title: Saturday: A few clouds. Temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon.

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.

entry.title: Sunday: Partly cloudy. High minus 31 with temperature falling to minus 36 in the afternoon.
